subject: Investing
title: Crypto Market Cycles
description: A short lesson to help you apply Crypto Market Cycles.

hook.text: Bitcoin has crashed over 75% four times in its historyâ€”and set new all-time highs after each crash.

buildup.text: Crypto markets follow boom-bust cycles roughly aligned with Bitcoin's four-year halving schedule.

discovery.text: Each cycle: accumulation by smart money, a parabolic rally, euphoric peak, crash, then long accumulation again.

twist.text: Past cycles don't guarantee future ones. As institutional capital grows, the patterns may flatten or shift.

climax.text: Understanding the cycle helps with timing entries and managing position sizes through volatile periods.

punchline.text: The cycle rewards patience and punishes panic. Every winter has ended in a spring.

quiz.question: What event roughly aligns with crypto market cycles?
